body.name: Lysol Power Foaming Cleaning Spray for Bathrooms, Foam Cleaner for Bathrooms, Showers, Tubs, 32oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 1 min
features: KILLS 99.9% OF BATHROOM VIRUSES AND BACTERIA: Lysol Power Bathroom Foamer is tested and proven to clean and kill 99.9% of bathroom bacteria and viruses (Use as directed). EPA Reg no.777-135.
DESTROYS BATHROOM SOAPSCUM: Powerful Bathroom Foam eliminates soap scum, limescale and everyday dirt and grime with no scrubbing; leaving your bathroom clean, brighter, and smelling fresh.
SANITIZES BATHROOM SURFACES IN 30 SECONDS: Fast action foaming spray makes it easier than ever to clean and sanitize your bathroom. (Use as directed).
CLEANS YOUR BATHROOM, NO SCRUBBING REQUIRED: Use this Foam to clean and brighten your shower doors, bathtubs, tiles, countertops, vinyl shower curtains, floors, and sinks.
LEADERS IN DISINFECTION: Looking for some of our other disinfectant products. Try our Lysol Disinfecting Wipes, Lysol Disinfectant Sprays and Lysol All Purpose Cleaners.
body.description: Lysol Bathroom Cleaner Trigger cleans to a brilliant shine. It tackles tough cleaning challenges like lime scale. It wipes away dirt and grime with little or no scrubbing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells fantastic, no high chemical smell. Nice and refreshing and cleans very well too! It’ll be my new go to bath cleaner for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good thick Foam with a very Nice Scent
reviews.reviewText: the thick foam stays on (doesn't run down} & we like the Pretty Scent it lasts for hours, and a very good cleaner we use it on multiple surfaces not just bathroom. we will buy it again & again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spray and walk away!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Been buying this at the store for years and then one day the shelf was empty and I was pissed. Amazon to the rescue! Ordered one bottle using me credit card reward points and the had it on my door step in the morning. This stuff works grest, keeps your chrome extra chromey, and doesn't require rinsing. Perfect for use in between deep cleans. Super thick and bubbly foam coats and cleans as the suds stream down into the tub or shower. Use after a deep cleaning and you will significantly extend the time between the next deep clean. U can use it in the sink too if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells fantastic, and it cleans up nicely
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing to me. Cleaning ability is top notch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does works well for cleaning in my bathroom. I am pleased with the quality and results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bottle, strong sprayer, amazing contents
reviews.reviewText: I am embarrassed to say that I created my own plumbing disaster by using and flushing obnoxious amounts of non-flushable wipes over an extended time period. For some dumb reason: I thought it only mattered if one had a septic tank. The day an impenetrable clog from hell had formed sent all the worst stuff back into the house? It was worse than you'd imagine. An excellent plumber snaked my system and fixed the problem. I had bought gallons of bleach, Clorox scrub, but I also ordered this spray for cleaning the awful mess left inside the entire floor of the stand-up shower, and the tub in the other bathroom, and for the toilets.Cleaning this mess? Required the bleaching products and a hot-water rinsing. But then it required a solid deep-cleansing overall with a new sponge and this product as the final step. This worked beautifully! The bottle is deceptively large and full. It is of high quality. The sprayer is even better, dispersing a thick, wide amount easily. And the solution itself worked brilliantly. It was unbelievable just how clean this spray left the showers: the walls, corners and floors. They were absolutely sparkling and smelled nice, never looked better. I will continue to buy and use this impressive product. Sorry about the gross story. But I thought this showed its cleaning power under the worst of conditions. And now I no longer flush anything but toilet paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job first time!

reviews.reviewText: This was a great bathroom cleaner, I have tried few bathroom cleaners however this is the best cleaner that I ever had. Just spray it using brush scrub it. Easy to use and inexpensive. Highly recommend.Yumi
